EXTRACTED VALUE: I’m still waiting for him to explain what’s on his mind tonight. He leans over and stares into my eyes. Aha, I think, he’s ready to reveal all.
Five years, Lily sighed. Five years to wear the life out of a good woman who’d deserved far, far better than she’d received.
"Fine, Miss Callahan," he called as soon as she had finished the scene. "Rehearsals start day after tomorrow. Monday, six p.m."
